name: KILLAPORTER
description:
>> NOW WITH 10 MORE LEVELS! <<


Action Puzzle game made during the 48 hour TOJAM2015.

Think before you shoot!

You can't move. But any enemy you shoot, you will teleport there. Beat the puzzles by killing every enemy. Use you're skill and speed as well as strategy to make it through these challenging levels.

Main Mechanic: To win you need to know...

  • Hold down shoot to launch a slow missile. This allows you to kill 2 enemies at the same time if timed right.


GAMEPLAY VIDEO - From The TOJAM2015

Use the slow missile to kill 2 enemies at once.

Looks easy doesn't it. Yeah, that's what they all say. Good luck player. Never give up.
